decks.notes: The main strategy of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of sacrificing creatures for benefits, dealing damage over time, and generating tokens to overwhelm the opponent. The deck focuses on maintaining board presence through sacrificing and recurring creatures, while also disrupting the opponent's graveyard strategies with cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Bojuka Bog. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Cast Down and Doom Blade to deal with threats, and finishes off opponents with direct damage from cards like Pestilence. Overall, the deck aims to outlast and outvalue the opponent through resource management and control.

The main focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Wild Growth and Utopia Sprawl, allowing for early drops of powerful creatures like Nyxborn Hydra and Avenging Hunter. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Ram Through and creatures with strong attack power like Jewel Thief and Eldrazi Repurposer. By establishing control of the board early on and pressuring the opponent with aggressive creatures, this deck aims to win the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence by utilizing low-cost artifacts and creatures like Glint Hawk and Thraben Inspector, supported by removal spells like Cast Down and interaction spells like Fanatical Offering. The deck also includes cards like Refurbished Familiar to provide extra value and resiliency. The deck aims to apply continuous pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan, ultimately overwhelming them with a combination of efficient threats and disruption.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with low-cost aggressive creatures and burn spells. Clockwork Percussionist and Experimental Synthesizer provide early threats, while Goblin Tomb Raider and Reckless Lackey help to maintain pressure. Voldaren Epicure and Mirran Banesplitter can provide additional value and power. Burn spells like Galvanic Blast, Lightning Bolt, and Fireblast can help to close out games. Gingerbrute and Goldhound provide additional aggressive options. The mana base is primarily Mountains with some artifact support from Great Furnace and Inventor's Axe. End the Festivities serves as a board wipe option if needed.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent through a combination of burn spells and aggressive creatures. By utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt, Fiery Temper, and Fireblast, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent's life total early in the game. Cards like Guttersnipe and Sneaky Snacker provide additional damage output while Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery help maintain card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy focused on dealing damage quickly and efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game using a variety of counterspells and bounce spells, while leveraging cheap spells like Mental Note and Thought Scour to generate card advantage. Lórien Revealed provides a consistent source of card draw, while Cryptic Serpent and Tolarian Terror serve as win conditions that can be played for cheap. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and outvalue them in the long run, ultimately finishing the game with powerful creatures or by milling them out.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of low-cost, efficient creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing creatures like Novice Inspector, Kor Skyfisher, and Lunarch Veteran, the deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on. Cards like Thraben Charm and Journey to Nowhere provide removal options, while Prismatic Strands can protect your creatures and buy you extra turns. Battle Screech offers a powerful token generation ability to further pressure the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to win quickly through aggressive tactics and efficient creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with small, cheap creatures that can be quickly buffed and protected with auras and enchantments. The focus is on aggressive play and maintaining a strong board presence through cards like Akroan Skyguard, Ethereal Armor, and Sentinel's Eyes. The deck aims to quickly build up a powerful, evasive army of weenies to pressure the opponent and secure a fast victory.

The core idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with low-cost, aggressive creatures and efficient counterspells while utilizing card draw and graveyard manipulation to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure. By combining aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent with disruptive spells like Counterspell and Dispel, the deck aims to control the game tempo and outpace the opponent, ultimately winning through fast damage and control of the battlefield.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast creatures and removal spells. Utilizing cards like Writhing Chrysalis and Gixian Infiltrator to apply pressure early on, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Cleansing Wildfire. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells such as Cast Down and Toxin Analysis, while also generating value with cards like Ichor Wellspring and Pulse of Murasa. The Jund color combination allows for a mix of aggression and disruption, creating a versatile and powerful aggro deck.

This Aggro-Jund deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent by utilizing low-cost creatures and removal spells. It also includes cards that provide card draw and land destruction to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck has a mix of creature removal, artifact destruction, and graveyard hate to deal with various threats. Overall, the deck aims to maintain aggression while controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using a combination of cheap and efficient creatures, burn spells, and direct damage effects. The goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Grab the Prize and Vampire's Kiss. Faithless Looting helps filter through the deck for key pieces, while cards like Fiery Temper and Lightning Bolt provide additional reach in finishing off the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive plays of the deck while also providing some utility with cards like Bojuka Bog and Rakdos Carnarium.

The deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice effects and card advantage to control the game and out-value the opponent. It utilizes cards like Ichor Wellspring and Eviscerator's Insight to generate card advantage, while also using Defile and Fanatical Offering to remove threats. The deck also includes graveyard hate with Nihil Spellbomb and Bojuka Bog, and has access to Crypt Rats and Pulse of Murasa for board control and life gain. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence with cards like Troll of Khazad-dûm and Khalni Garden, while disrupting the opponent's strategy with removal spells like Cast Down and Duress.

The deck focuses on quickly playing and sacrificing artifacts to deal damage to the opponent using cards like Galvanic Blast and Makeshift Munitions. It also utilizes affinity for artifacts to cast spells for less mana, allowing for faster plays. The deck includes various artifacts that can be sacrificed or recycled for value, along with cards like Nihil Spellbomb for graveyard hate. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggro creatures and burn spells, while also drawing cards efficiently with Thoughtcast.

The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through a combination of creatures with haste, direct damage spells, and burn spells. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of damage, utilizing cheap spells and efficient creatures to maintain pressure on the opponent throughout the game. The deck aims to close out the game as quickly as possible by leveraging its aggressive creatures and burn spells to burn through the opponent's life total before they can stabilize.

This Jund aggro deck focuses on a combination of efficient removal spells and artifact sacrifice synergy to control the board and pressure the opponent. By utilizing cards like Cleansing Wildfire and Drossforge Bridge to disrupt the opponent's mana base and generate value, paired with Fanatical Offering and Refurbished Familiar for additional sacrifice effects, this deck aims to outvalue the opponent and maintain a consistent board presence. With a mix of removal, card draw, and sacrifice outlets, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats and disruption.
